text: Wibke Kristin Timmermann is a German scholar of international law. She was awarded the Henry Dunant Prize 2006 for her thesis "Incitement, Instigation, Hate Speech and War Propaganda in International Law". ==Works== * ==References== Category:International criminal law scholars Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Wibke Kristin Timmermann
